Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
Plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins & 92 nominations.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Writer: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
Actors: Alan Howard, Noel Appleby, Sean Astin, Sala Baker
Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: Game of Thrones
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington
Plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 253 wins & 441 nominations.
